Text: Screens? Quality? Cinavia Protected for anyone?
This is scenebalance, which means your comment will not be answered, and this torrent will most likely not be seeded.

"The occasional cinavia error on the PS3 does not occur on all PS3's. If it happens to you, don't claim it will happen to everyone"

 Sorry but that's mostly BS.

 The only way it won't happen on one PS3 and not another is if they havn't been updating it's firmware past a certain point.
